text.content: He waited for his friends outside.
They had planned to meet at 6 p.m.
Thirty minutes passed, but his friends didn’t show up.
He called Juan, but it went straight to voicemail.
He tried calling Sofia, but she didn’t answer either.
He decided to go inside alone.
He bought a ticket and got in line at the concession stand.
Then, he walked into the viewing room.
He found a comfy seat and sat down.
The movie started, and Carlos forgot about his friends.
He enjoyed the film, even though he was alone.
